title: Christmas Movie Pack 720p-BDM
description:
Happy holidays from my family to yours! 

A pack of Christmas movies I've recently downloaded from different sources.
Most are from YTS (Yify), and some are from other sources but all are 720p and small in size.

***Thank you so much to original uploaders, you guys are awesome! Just thought I'd make it easier for people wanting some holiday films in one torrent.***
